inn1.comm: excellent start, Mortaza hits a good length outside off stump and seams away from the left-hander, Tharanga fishes on the front foot but gets beaten
this one pitches closer to off stump and angles across Tharanga who gets drawn into a front-foot defence and gets beaten once again
shorter length and wider outside the off stump, Tharanga lets it go this time
wide outside the off stump once again, left alone by the batsman
once again Mortaza pitches wide outside off stump and angles it further away, Rudi Koertzen calls it wide

dropped, Mortaza induces the outside edge with a perfectly pitched delivery that seams a fraction away from Tharanga who pushed forward at it, Mushfiqur Rahim dives to his left with one hand and drops a regulation chance
left alone outside the off stump
pitches on a good length on off stump and holds its line, Jayasuriya moves across his stumps and defends
Rasel strays on to middle and leg stump and Jayasuriya flicks it off his pads for the first runs off the bat
too short and too wide outside the off stump, Tharanga waits for it and cuts off the back foot through cover point for four
good length delivery on middle stump, Tharanga dabs it off his pads to Tushar Imran at mid-on and sets off for a risky single
defended on the front foot towards point
good length outside the off stump, Jayasuriya moves back and across and drives towards cover
good length delivery pitches on off stump and seams away from Tharanga off the pitch, he lets it go through to Mushfiqur, 131 kmh that was
Tharanga pushes forward and a ball that slants across him and gets an outside edge that runs wide of second slip and down to third man
short of a length on middle stump, Tharanga moves on the back foot and defends
fuller delivery wide outside the off stump, Tharanga takes a stride forward and shoulders arms, Koertzen is inspecting the pitch after Mortaza's follow through
tight line and length around off stump, Tharanga comes forward and defends
Tharanga tries to drive through cover on the back foot but the ball bounces more than he expects and the outside edge goes towards point
trademark Jayasuriya, he flicks a full delivery on leg stump off his pads to the square-leg fence, he can play that shot in his sleep
width offered outside the off stump this time, Jayasuriya cuts hard off the back foot to Aftab Ahmed at point
good length on off stump from Rasel, Jayasuriya moves back and defends with a straight bat
pitches outside the off stump and cuts back into Jayasuriya who steps forward and defends
fuller length wide outside the off stump, Jayasuriya lets it go through to Mushfiqur who is standing up to the stumps
good length outside the off stump, Jayasuriya drives to cover on the back foot
pitches on middle stump and angles across Tharanga, he opens the face of the bat to angle the ball towards third man
pitches on middle and leg stump and angles into Jayasuriya who gets on to the front foot and is hit high on the front pad
short of  a length outside off stump, Jayasuriya moves back and lets it go
Mortaza is keeping it tight aroudn the off stump, Jayasuriya takes half a step forward and defends to cover
Mortaza offers Jayasuriya some width outside the off stump and thats all he needs to jump on to the back foot and drive it through cover, he's so strong square of the wicket
pitches on a good length on leg and middle stump, Jayasuriya moves towards off and plays it to midwicket
Rasel pitches it just outside the off stump and angles it into Tharanga who gets on to the front foot and is hit on the pad, that was missing leg and maybe too high as well
defended on the front foot back to Rasel
Rasel is getting it to nip back into Tharanga off the pitch, once again he hits him on the pad but it's too high
fuller length outside the off stump at 122 kmh, defended on the front foot to cover
short of  a length outside the off stump, Tharanga moves back and across and defends to the off side
short of  a length outside off stump, Tharanga comes forward and has to wait for the ball before playing it towards cover
pitches just short of a length on middle and off stump, Jayasuriya waits on the back foot and defends to cover
just a bit too straight from Mortaza on leg and middle stump, Jayasuriya moves across and nudges it down to fine leg
131 kmh, full and straight on middle and off stump, Tharanga was late on the shot and hurriedly played it back towards the bowler on the front foot
once again Mortaza beats the outside edge, that was pitched on off stump and seamed away from Tharanga who pushed forward at it
Mortaza bowls it wide outside the off stump and Tharanga cuts it crisply off the back foot, Aftab dives to his right at point to save the boundary
Mortaza strays down leg side, excellent take by Mushfiqur who has to dive at full stretch to his right
Jayasuriya gets squared up by one that angles across him after pitching on middle stump, the outside edge flies down to third man
Jayasuriya tires to whip Rasel through midwicket but gets an inside edge that runs down to fine leg

Rasel over-steps and bowls a fuller delivery on off and middle stump, Jayasuriya frees his arms and lofts it over mid-on, he got more height than distance on the shot and it will pull up inside the ropes
this time he gets it right, Jayasuriya takes it from off stump and flicks it high and far over midwicket, the ball went extremely high and had enough on it to clear the ropes
width offered outside the off stump, Jayasuriya cuts it off the back foot to cover point

bowled him, Rasel pitches one outside off stump and cuts it back into Jayasuriya who pushes away from his body with a gap between bat and pad, the ball bats the inside edge of Jayasuriya's bat and crashes into off stump, that moves a fair bit off the pitch into the left-hander, huge wicket for Bangladesh
short of a length outside the off stump, Sangakkara moves back and across and drives to cover point
fuller delivery on off stump, Sangakkara leans forward and defends to the off side
good length ball on middle and off stump, Tharanga moves forward and pushes the ball wide of the fielder at mid-off
pitches on off stump and moves a long way away from Sangakkara who pulls his bat away from the ball, Koertzen has another look at Mortaza's follow through
good length ball pitches on off stump and slants across Sangakkara who moves forward and lifts his bat out of the way, that carried through at a good height to Mushfiqur
Sangakkara stands on the back foot and tries to drive through cover, the movement away from him induces the outside edge that runs to third man
once again Mortaza beats Tharanga outside the off stump, the movement across him is troubling him
pitches just outside leg stump and hits Tharanga on the pad, Tharanga was caught on the crease but it was nevrr going to be out once it pitched outside leg stump
fuller delivery around the off stump, defended on the front foot
Sangakkara moves back in his crease and punches a good-length delivery past Rasel and gets a single

dropped again, Sangakkara tries to cut a good length delivery outside the off stump, the ball moved away from the left-hander and bounced a little more too, the outside edge flew to the right of Nafees at first slip, he got one hand on it but couldn't hold on
defended on the front foot towards cover
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Mortaza pitches it on a good length outside off stump and slants it away from the left-hander
pitches on leg stump and moves across Tharanga who closes the face too early and gets a leading edge that lobs over cover
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Sangakkara comes down the track and tries to hit over the off side, he gets more of an outside edge that runs towards third man
good length ball angles into Tharanga from outside off stump, he leans forward and defends towards midwicket and gets a single

a little shorter in length on off and middle stump, pretty good delivery but Sangakkara moves deep in his crease and punches off the back foot straight past the bowler, he's timed that superbly and will get four
another one but this time Sangakkara drives wide of the fielder at mid-on for four, he uses the depth of the crease to maximum advantage
defended on the front foot towards point
once again Rasel drops it a little short but Sangakkara has so much time to go back and punch it towards cover
Rasel bowls it wide outside the off stump and Sangakkara's ready with the cut, he places it wide of Mortaza at third man and will get two
good length ball on off stump, nothing wrong with the delivery but Tharanga waits until the last moment before cutting it, more of a slice actually, past point for four
pushed off the front foot to mid off for one more
pitches outside off stump and moves away from Sangakkara with the angle of the arm, he lets it go

caught, Mortaza pitches it on middle stump and seams it away from Sangakkara who is caught on the crease, he gets squared up and tries to defend, the seam movement induces the outside edge to Mushfiqur who makes no mistake this time
pitches on a good length around the off stump, Jayawardene waits on the back foot and defends towards point
defended with a straight bat on the front foot
Rasel gets it to bounce sharply outside Tharanga's off stump, he defends it awkwardly on the back foot
played to point off the back foot
good length delivery angling into Tharanga from over the wicket, he defends on the back foot to Rasel
shorter and wide outside the off stump, Tharanga cuts hard off the back foot but hits it straight to the fielder
pushed off the front foot to midwicket, Shakib moves quickly to his right, picks up and shies at the non-striker's end, had he hit Tharanga would have been out
played with an open face to third man
defended on the front foot towards point, Mortaza is bowling on a good length around off stump
pitches on off stump and angles into the right-hander, Jayawardene plays it to midwicket
Mortaza bowls it full on off stump, the ball seams away from Jayawardene off the pitch, Jayawardene doesn't move his feet and pushes at it, the outside edge falls short of first slip
driven on the up to point
fuller length on off and middle stump, Jayawardene moves forward and drives to mid-on
good length delivery on off stump, Jayawardene strides forward and pushes towards mid-off
full delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga leans forward and drives elegantly to the man on the cover fence
good-length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga waits on the back foot and defends to the off side
Rasel is getting the ball to skid off the pitch on to Tharanga who moves forward and defends back to the bowler
fuller and wider outside the off stump, Tharanga tries to play the big drive through covers but the ball bounced higher than usual and beat the bat, Mushfiqur had a tough time collecting that
Rasel bowls the slower ball that cuts into Tharanga, he tried to drive at first but had to stop his shot
defended on the front foot to cover
quick and flat delivery on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Razzak strays on to middle and leg stump, Jayawardene tries to flick but misses
Jayawardene pushes a quick delivery on off stump to mid-off for a single, Farhad Reza fumbled or that could have been close
fired in fast towards middle stump, defended to midwicket
Tharanga uses his feet to come down the pitch and play it to mid-on, he immediately set off for the single

dropped!, Jayawardene skips down the pitch and hits one straight back at Razzak who drops a straight forward caught and bowled chance, that's the third catch that they've dropped this morning, Jayawardene's would have been a massive wicket
played to third man off the back foot
driven on the back foot to cover
width offered outside the off stump, Jayawardene waits on the back foot and steers it to point

caught! Rasel slants one across Jayawardene who moves on to the front foot and spoons the cover drive to Shakib at cover, that was a simple catch, lazy shot from Jayawardene, the length wasn't there for the drive and he played away from his body, a soft dismissal
defended on the front foot toward Shakib at cover
fuller delivery on middle and off stump, Silva leans forward and defends
bowled flat and quick on off and middle stump, Tharanga defends to midwicket
slower delivery on off and middle stump, Tharanga pushes to mid-on but doesn't get the single this time
defended towards square leg on the back foot
pushed towards mid-on off the front foot
Tharanga pushes forward at one that is angled into him and gets an inside edge to midwicket
Razzak strays down leg side, wide called, sharp take by Mushfiqur moving to his right
tossed up outside the off stump, defended on the front foot, just the one wide off the over
pitches on a good length on middle and off stump, defended on the back foot towards the leg side
Rasel pitches outside leg stump, Silva moves across and plays it off his pads to square leg
Silva tries to cut one from outside the off stump, the length wasn't short enough for the cut and the ball beats the bat
defended on the front foot towards point
driven off the front foot to Shakib at cover
driven off the front foot to mid-off, Silva starts off for the single but decides against it
pitches on off stump and angles into Tharanga who defends on the back foot to Reza
Reza bowls it a little wider outside off stump, Tharanga uses the shorter length to move back and cut but can't get past Aftab at point
driven off the front foot to short cover
good length once again, the angle into Tharanga denies him room, he pushes to mid-on and looks for a single that isn't there
once again Tharanga cuts and once again he doesn't beat Tamaim Iqbal at cover point
Reza completes an impressive first over with a slower ball, Tharanga drives through covers for a single
bowled flat through the air on off stump, Tharanga leans forward and blocks
wide outside the off stump, Tharanga moves across and tries to pull the ball, misses it completely
driven on the front foot through covers
Razzak bowls it straight on middle and of stump, Silva defends on the front foot
Silva moves quickly on to the back foot and cuts a short ball outside the off stump past short third man, Sri Lanka finally find the fence, the first boundary for nine overs
defended on the front foot to midwicket
Tharanga walks down the pitch and drives into the ground back at Reza, the bounce takes the ball over Reza's head and they scamper a quick single to mid-off
full-length delivery on off stump, Silva drives on the front foot to mid-off
tight length just outside the off stump, Silva strides forward and defends to point
a fraction shorter in length outside the off stump, Silva waits for it in his crease and cuts to point
Reza keeps it around the off stump, no room at all for Silva who defends to point once again
Silva plays the last ball of the over with soft hands in front of cover and sets off for a single, Reza finishes another economical over
Silva steps down the pitch and picks Razzak off his pads and lofts him over midwicket for four, that was a calculated risk from Silva
Silva steps out of his crease and tries to sweep this time but misses
quicker delivery angles into Tharanga from over the wicket, defended on the front foot
Razzak offers Tharanga some width but he cuts straight to short third man
driven off the pads to Aftab at midwicket
short and wide outside the off stump, Razzak releases the pressure with a poor ball which Tharanga cuts to the backward-point fence
Reza hits the pitch hard outside the off stump, Silva lans forward and pushes it to point
Silva lunges forward and opens the face to play it to backward point
fuller length on off stump, Silva leans forward and plays the off-drive to mid-off
Reza drifts on to middle and leg stump and Silva plays it off his pads to midwicket
Reza bowls it wide outside the off stump, Silva plays late and dabs it towards short third man
Reza bangs in the bouncer from round the wicket, Tharanga sways out of the way
nudged to short third man for  a single
Razzak offers Tharanga room outside off stump, Tharanga cuts to Mortaza who lets it slip past him at short third man and allows the single
Silva uses the room outside off stump to cut to deep point
Tharanga walks across his stumps and closes the face to play it to midwicket
wide outside the off stump but the length isn't short enough to cut, Tharanga tries to play through point and gets beaten
driven on the front foot to cover
Reza drifts on to leg stump, a rare loose delivery from him, Silva moves across and flicks it off his pads to the fine-leg boundary
Silva plays with soft hands in front of point and sprints though for the single, he was already out of his crease when he played the shot
pushed off the back foot towards mid-off
Reza drops it short on off stump aand Tharanga hits it with a flat-bat with immense power past the bowler for four
played through covers on the front foot, that's a more orthodox shot compared to the previous boundary
fuller delivery on off stump, defended on the front foot
floated outside off stump and Tharanga is beaten on the sweep
turns in from just outside off, Tharanga goes back to work it to fine leg to bring up the 100 of Sri Lanka. It has been slow in coming.
slightly short, cut to deep point for a single.
tossed-up, outside off and driven to sweeper cover
fuller, on the middle and leg, Silva shaped to play it to the on side and got a leading edge down the track
slightly short in length, turning away, cut straight to point
on a length, around the off stump, tapped to the on side
fullish, from round the stumps, on the off stump line, driven down the track
drags this one short and offers width outside off, Tharanga cuts it to left of sweeper cover
Chamara getting itchy. Charges down the track and tries to swing a length delivery over midwicket but flicks it down the ground and straight to midwicket
leans forward to defend to the off side
high bouncer, wide called, Rahim had a shy at the striker's end (Silva is taking guard well outside the crease) and it richochets off to give an overthrow
Thrilling inside-out cover drive from Silva. He took a step down the track, reached the pitch of a delivery on the stumps and lofted it inside-out for a six
sliding on to the middle and leg, turned past square leg
full and on the off and middle, worked to midwicket

just outside off and cut to third man. Mortaza runs after it and just about manages to drag it back before rolling over the ropes. Then comes the mistake. His back foot was still outside the ropes when he swooped to pick the ball up! Four given
turning in from the off stump line, tapped to the on sisde
walks across, tries to swing a length delivery from outside off over midwicket but hits it straight to midwicket.
outside the off stump, on a length, guided to point
Paddled away for a four. It landed back of length, on the off and middle and Silva lapped it around the corner.
Fuller this time, just outside off, driven to mid off
full-pitched outside the off stump, Silva goes hard at it and can't connect with his intended square drive. Drinks break
tossed up on off and middle, Tharanga leans forward and plays it to midwicket
played off the pads to short fine leg
driven to long-off on the front foot
Shakib gives the ball air outside the off stump, defended towards point on the front foot
Silva plays with soft hands towards point but doesn't get the single
fuller delivery angling into the right-hander, Silva moves forward and drives to long-off
Reza pitches it on a good length outside off stump and moves it away from the right-hander, Silva drives loosely away from his body and gets beaten
too wide outside the off stump, Koertzen calls it wide, that's only the eighth extra off the innings
defended off the front foot towards point
Reza drags it short outside the off stump, Silva waits on the back foot and plays a whippy drive through covers for a single
very wide outside the off stump, Tharanga reaches out and cuts to third man
fuller length on of stump, Silva leans into a well-timed off drive to long-off for a single, he's playing confidently now
Reza ends the over with a bouncer, Tharanga gets out of the way
tossed up on off and middle stump, Silva gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep backward square leg
Tharanga plays the sweep this time, but can't beat short fine leg

swept again and this time Tharanga places it superbly and has timed that equally well, the ball beats  the fielder at deep backward square leg, he reaches 50, it's been a patient innings from Tharanga
defended on the back foot
Tharanga waits on the back foot and opens the face to play it to short third man
Tharanga uses his feet to skip down the pitch and drive to midwicket
full length and Reza gives Silva the width outside off stump to free his arms and drive through cover

the outside edge flies wide of Mushfiqur and runs down to the fence, Silva tried to force one off the back foot through cover, he didn't move his feet and got a  thick outside edge that flew too quickly for Mushfiqur
defended to point on the front foot
driven to mid-off on the front foot
Reza drifts on to the pads and Silva flicks off his legs to fine leg
Reza ends another over with a bouncer, Tharanga thought about pulling it but checked his shot
Silva gets down on one knee and sweeps powerfully from outside the off stump, he splits the gap between the fielders at deep square leg and deep midwicket, superb placement
driven on the front foot through covers for one more
bowled quicker and flatter on the pads, Tharanga plays it to midwicket
Tharanga tries to pull a ball that isn't short enough and hits it awkwardly towards mid-on
driven to long-off for one more
Tharanga moves across his stumps and flicks through square leg, eight runs off the over
short and wide outside the off stump, Tharanga waits for it on the back foot and cuts it in front of point for four, cracking timing, that brings up Sri Lanka's 150

caught! Reza angles the ball into Tharanga from round the wicket and moves it away from the left-hander off the pitch, Tharanga moves forward and drives loosely at it and gets a thick edge to Mushfiqur who takes the simplest of catches
pitches outside the off stump and holds it's line through to Mushfiqur after Dilshan lets it go
Dilshan tries to play a square drive to one that isn't short enough to drive, he gets beaten
fuller length outside the off stump, Dilshan moves forward, gets his front foot closer to the ball and drives to cover
good length outside the off stump, Dilshan stands rooted to the crease and tries to drive through covers, the ball beats the bat once again
Shakib angles the ball into Silva from round the wicket and Silva sweeps him to deep backward square leg
defended on the front foot back to Shakib
Shakib drops it a fraction short outside the off stump, Dilshan moves back and cuts through point to get off the mark, these two run very quickly between the wickets
quicker delivery on middle stump, Dilshan drives inside out to cover
Dilshan tries to sweep but misses and gets hit on the pad
once again Dilshan uses the room outside off to cut to the fielder on the point fence
Dilshan tries to drive Reza on the up through the offside but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
good length delivery on off stump, Silva gets caught on the crease and pushes it to cover
Reza bowls the slower ball on off stump, Silva drives off the front foot to long-off
too wide outside the off stump and Dilshan will be disappointed that he cut that straight to point
Dilshan moves deep in his crease and waits for the ball to come to him before driving it wide of the fielder at mid-on, he gives chase and pulls it in just inside the ropes
Silva tries to pull but gets a top edge that falls safely in front of the fielder at deep midwicket
defended on the front foot towards point, he's played that with soft hands and calls for the single to take him to his half-century, it's been an excellent innings under pressure from Silva
Dilshan nimbly skips down the pitch and drives Shakib inside out through extra cover
a little shorter in length and Dilshan backs away and drives to cover
swept behind square on the leg side for a single
played towards point with an open face
Silva comes down the track and tries to whip Shakib through midwicket, he misses and the ball hits the pad
full and wide outside the off stump, Dilshan reaches out for the ball and drives through cover
Chamara Silva moves across his stumps and tries to sweep but misses and gets hit on the pad
full delivery on off stump, Dilshan drives it hard back at Aftab who stops it with his boot
a fraction short on off and middle stump, Dilshan moves on to the back foot and pulls it in front of midwicket
over-pitched outside the off stump, driven powerfully but straight to mid-off
width offered outside the off stump, Dilshan goes back and cuts extremely hard but hits it to the fielder at cover
cut off the back foot to point
Silva steps down the track and forces the drive to long-on, there's a huge gap at midwicket
Shakib strays down leg side, Silva leans across and paddles to fine leg
leg-stump line once again and Silva gets down on one knee and sweeps powerfully to deep backward square leg for four, excellent placement
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Silva moves across his stumps to play the sweep once more but this time he doesn't beat the fielder at short fine leg
Aftab bowls it short outside the off stump, Dilshan moves back in his crease and drills the square drive past point
fuller length outside off stump, Silva leans forward and opens the face of the bat to guide the ball to third man
long hop on off stump, Dilshan waits on the back foot and pulls it with power in front of midwicket for four more
played off the pads through midwicket
Silva again gets down on one knee and times the sweep superbly to the square leg fence, he rolled his wrists to keep the ball along the ground
Silva moves across his stumps and chips the ball in the air towards fine leg, Sri Lanka are stepping up the pace now
begins with a short ball on off stump, Dilshan cuts off the back foot to point
played to point off the back foot once again
pitches on off stump and spins away from Dilshan who prods tentatively at it, the ball beats the bat
driven inside out off the back foot through covers

that's close and Asoka de Silva raises the finger! Razzak bowls a quicker ball on middle stump and it goes straight through to Silva who moves back and tries to flick, he misses and the ball hits him on the back pad plumb in front, big wicket for Bangladesh during the final overs
Razzak bowls it wide outside the off stump, Mubarak lets it go
short and wide outside the off stump, Dilshan cuts off the back foot through covers for two more
Dilshan pushes towards cover and puts pressure on the fielder by calling for the single, the mis-field allows them to complete it comfortably
Mubarak comes forward and plays it through point for  a single, he's off the mark
played back to the bowler on the back foot
Dilshan pushes to long-on for  a single
Mubarak tries to cut and gets an outside edge to Rasel at short third man where another clumsy mis-field allows the batsman three runs
Mubarak plays it to Mortaza at short third man
tossed up outside the off stump, Mubarak waits for it and opens the face of the bat to play the ball wide of Mortaza at short third man
Razzak tosses it up on off and middle stump, Mubarak drives firmly past the bowler, Aftab runs across from long-on and drives full stretch to his right to save the boundary
driven through cover for two more
Mubarak goes back to a short delivery and cuts through point for two more, he's not letting Dilshan have the strike
Razzak bowls a quicker and fuller delivery on off and middle stump, Mubarak defends back to the bowler

caught! Mortaza bangs it in short on off stump, Dilshan tries to pull and loses grip of his bat, the ball flies off the edge towards Ashraful at cover, who takes an easy catch, while the bat flies a fair distance towards Rasel at midwicket
that bounces sharply outside the off stump and Maharoof was beaten by the bounce
Maharoof doesn't move his feet and tries to drive through the off side, the ball beats the outside edge
this time Maharoof moves his front foot towards the ball and drives through cover
Mortaza pitches on leg stump and Mubarak flicks off his pads for his customary double through square leg
Mortaza bangs in the bouncer that rises sharply from a  good length, Malinga and Fernando will be watching with interest
played off the back foot through point for  a single
Mubarak tries to sweep and Mushfiqur appeals after the ball hits the pad, that was missing leg stump
Maharoof comes down the track and flicks off his pads through midwicket, Shakib charges in from the deep and keeps it down to just a  single
Mubarak tries to cut off the back foot and gets beaten
driven through midwicket for a single
fuller delivery on middle stump, Maharoof comes down the track and pushes towards wide mid-on, he calls Mubarak through for the second run
Mubarak tries to pull Mortaza through midwicket but is beaten for pace and gets hit on the thigh for leg byes to third man
Maharoof backs away towards the leg side to make room and tries to slog Mortaza through midwicket, he gets beaten by a slower ball
he backs away again and swats a short ball outside the off stump to long-off, like a tennis forehand
Mortaza bowls the bouncer on middle and off stump, Mubarak is caught on the crease and has to get out of the way
the slower delivery on middle stump, Mubarak spots it, gets his front pad out of the way, and lofts it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
pulled to long-on for a single to end the over
width offered outside the off stump, Mubarak moves back and cuts to Shakib at cover

Maharoof moves his front foot out of the way and tries to hit Razzak over midwicket, he gets a top edge that goes high in the direction of mid-off, Ashraful runs towards the catch from cover but can't make enough ground to reach it
driven on the front foot to long-on
driven off the back foot to long-off
Maharoof makes room by moving towards the leg side and lofts Razzak cleanly over extra cover, he's timed that so well that it's cleared the fence, awesome hit
driven on the front foot to long-on for a single

inn2.comm: pitches on leg and middle and bounces on Tamim who jumps on to the back foot and gets hit high on the pad
pitches on middle stump and cuts across Tamim who gets squared up, the outside edge falls short of second slip
Maharoof strays on to the pads and Tamim flicks off his hips for  a single to get Bangladesh on the scoreboard
Nafees pushes off his pads to square leg, Tamim runs a long way down for the single but Nafees sends him back
fuller length pitching on off stump and angling away from the left-hander, Nafees pushes forward in defense but gets beaten
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
full and straight on middle stump, Tamim moves back in his crease and defends back to Malinga, 84mph that was
83 mph, full and close to off stump, Tamim hardly movs his feet and plays an airy drive, the ball beats the inside edge of the bat
Malinga over-pitches outside the off stump, Tamim moves forward and punches on the up through cover, superb timing and the ball races to the fence, flashy stroke
Malinga bowls a shorter length on middle stump, Tamim plays it off his pads
Malinga digs one in short on middle stump, Tamim jumps on to the back foot and defends
Malinga ends the over with a bouncer over leg stump, Tamim ducks under it
Maharoof pitches outside the leg stump, Nafees moves across his stumps and gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye to fine leg
Maharoof gets it to bounce sharply on middle stump, Tamim gets half forward and defends, the ball hits him on the thigh pad
fuller length from Maharoof on off stump, Tamim stands his ground and drives to mid off
punches off the front foot back to Maharoof who moves quickly to his right and fields off his own bowling
Maharoof gives Tamim a little width outside off stump and he tries to smash it through covers with an ambitious drive
pitches on off stump and moves away from Tamim who plays from his crease and gets beaten
Malinga pitches outside leg stump and Nafees once again misses the flick but gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye
defended on the back foot towards Malinga, who's bowling a shorter length at the moment
short of a length on middle stump, Tamim pushes it off his pads towards midwicket and calls for the single, Malinga sprints across and cuts off the run
short of a length outside the off stump this time, Tamim waits on the back foot and drives to cover
good length ball on off stump, Tamim plays it with soft hands in front of mid-off and sets off for the single
Malinga bowls short of  a length on leg stump, Nafees plays it towards square leg
Maharoof pitches on leg stump, Tamim strides forward and plays towards midwicket
Maharoof over-steps and bowls a good-length delivery on off stump that Tamim pushes towards cover
Maharoof strays on to the pads and Tamim flicks down to fine leg for a single
short of a length on off stump, Nafees moves back and plays it in front of point where Dilshan moves sharply towards his left and cuts off the single
Nafees throws his bat at one outside the off stump and gets an outside edge over point to get off the mark
fuller length on off stump, Nafees leans forward and drives on the up between cover and point for a single
driven on the up once again towards cover
Malinga once again hits Nafees on the thigh and they run a leg bye to fine leg
the slower delivery at 113 kmh per hour on off stump, Tamim picks it well and defends towards cover on the front foot
Malinga strays far down leg side this time, Tamim tries to flick but it's too far away from the body, wide called
short of a length on leg and middle stump, Tamim moves back in his crease and pushes towards midwicket for a single
leg-stump line once again from Malinga, Nafees maks contact with the flick and plays towards fine leg
short of a length on off stump, Tamim waits on the back foot and drives on the up but straight to Dilshan at point
pitches on leg stump, Tamim moves back and flicks off his pads to square leg, Malinga's struggling to find his line, he's been on leg stump so far
excellent delivery, Maharoof pitches on off stump, hits the seam and gets the ball to bounce and seam away from Nafees who defends tentatively and gets beaten
played off the pads down to fine leg
defended on the back foot towards midwicket, Maharoof is pushing the batsman on to the back foot with his length
good length on middle stump, Tamim punches off the back foot towards Maharoof
fuller length on off stump, Tamim leans forward and drives to cover
short of a length on middle stump, defended on the back foot to Maharoof
good length ball on off stump, Nafees defends towards point
fuller length outside the off stump, Nafees moves back and tries to cut but the ball beats the bat
short and wide outside the off stump, Nafees jumps on to the back foot and cuts up and over point for four, he didn't try to keep that on the ground
Fernando bowls on the pads and Nafees flicks to fine leg
Fernando gives Tamim width outside off, Tamim stands on the back foot and with an extravagant swing of the bat, drives through point for a single
defended on the back foot towards Fernando
Tamim tries to flick Maharoof through midwicket but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Tamim drives a short of a length delivery from Maharoof extremely hard at Silva at short cover who makes a superb save, that was hit with supreme timing
Maharoof strays down leg side
Tamim gets on to the front foot and drives past Maharoof, he didn't time that perfectly and Jayasuriya runs to his right at mid-on and cuts it off
slower delivery outside the off stump, Nafees mis-times the drive to cover
131 kmh, good length on off stump, Nafees moves back in his crease and defends with a straight bat
Maharoof offers an over-pitched delivery on middle and leg stump, Nafees flicks off his pads through midwicket for four more, Bangladesh have begun their chase confidently
good length delivery on off stump, Tamim tries to defend on the off side but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
full toss on leg and middle stump, Tamim plays it wide off Malinga who runs and dives to his left at mid-on
full ball outside the off stump, Nafees cuts hard off the front foot but Dilshan dives to his right at point and save runs
good length delivery on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the bowler
full length on off stump, Nafees strides forward and drives to cover where Tharanga fields and throws down the stumps at the bowler's end, the ricochet off the stumps concedes overthrows
Fernando digs in the bouncer to end the over
Nafees picks a full ball off the pads and lofts it over midwicket for four more
Maharoof strays down leg side once again
good length delivery on off stump, Nafees tries to play towards cover but gets a bottom edge
full length on off stump, Nafees steps forward and drives towards cover point
Nafees strides on to the front foot and defends a good length ball to cover
Nafees tries to cut a delivery that is neither too short or too wide, he plays it late and wide of Jayawardene at first slip for four more
too short from Maharoof, Nafees gets into position quickly and pulls over midwicket for another boundary
Fernando searches for the yorker and bowls a low full toss on leg stump, Tamim plays towards midwicket

caught at slip, Fernando pitches the ball short of  a length on middle stump and angles it across Tamim who hardly moves his feet and plays with the bat away from the body, he gets a thick edge through to Jayawardene at waist height
Fernando is looking for the yorker but doesn't quite get the line right, Imran flicks off his pads to midwicket
Fernando bowls a short one outside off stump and the ball climbs on Imran, he lets it go through to Sangakkara
Fernando bowls a full delivery down leg side, Imran tries to flick but doesn't make contact
Fernando bowls a good length outside the off stump, he draws Imran forward and beats the outside edge of the forward defense

Fernando has two in the same over! He bowls full and straight, Imran takes half a stride across his stumps and is caught on the crease when the ball thuds into pad, Asoka de Silva takes his time but eventually raises the finger
Maharoof angles into Nafees from round the wicket, he defends on the back foot
Maharoof bowls a bit too straight this time and Nafees flicks off the front foot between midwicket and mid-on

another one goes, Maharoof pitches on a good length on off stump, gets the ball to bounce and angle across Shakib who doesn't move his feet while playing away from his body, Sangakkara gleefully accepts the edge
good length delivery outside the off stump, Ashraful defends tentatively and gets an inside edge on to the pad
short of a length outside the off stump, defended on the back foot
Fernando over-pitches on middle and leg stump and Ashraful dispatches the half-volley with a neat flick over midwicket, minimum power, maximum timing
Nafees flicks a half-volley from Fernando between mid-on and midwicket for a single, Malinga runs to his left from mid-on and fields
Fernando gives Ashraful a short ball outside the off stump, he lets it go through to Sangakkara
defended on the back foot towards the off side, Fernando forced Ashraful on to the back foot with his length
defended solidly on the front foot, tight line and length around the off stump from Fernando
banged in short outside the off stump, Fernando is working up a heady pace

Ashraful falls, Fernando gives him another short delivery, Ashraful tries to play a pull but mis-times it and gets a top edge that flies somewhere mid-way towards fine leg, Sangakkara and Jayawardene, at first slip, both give chase but Maharoof runs in from the fine-leg fence, slides as he reaches the ball, and takes a well-judged catch
left alone outside the off stump
good length delivery on off stump, Aftab defends towards cover on the back foot
good length ball on off stump, Aftab moves behind the line of the ball and blocks
short of  a length and wider outside the off stump, Aftab lets it go through to Sangakkara
left alone once again outside the off stump, Maharoof completes a maiden over
Fernando angles a full delivery into middle and leg stump from round the wicket, Nafees flicks towards midwicket
Nafees tries to cut a good-length delivery that is angling into him and gets a bottom edge towards point
this time Fernando doesn't angle the ball into the left-hander, it pitches outside off stump and goes straight through, Nafees plays inside the line of the ball and gets beaten
Fernando over-pitches on the pads, Nafees chips it off his pads just out of the reach of Mubarak at square leg, that's timed well enough to reach the fence

it's Nafees' turn to go, the carnage continues, Fernando bowls the heavy ball short of  a length and angles it into Nafees, Nafees moves back in his crease and closes the face of the bat to play the ball through midwicket, the ball hits the inside edge and bounced off the thigh pad to Silva at gully
full and fast outside the off stump, Mushfiqur lets it go through to Sangakkara
good length ball on off stump, defended on the back foot
pitches short of a length outside the off stump, Aftab moves forward and shoulders arms
Maharoof strays on to the pads and Aftab gets a single by flicking through square leg
pitches on a good length outside off stump and rises sharply on Mushfiqur who begins to play at it but pulls his bat out of the way
defended on the back foot towards the off side
excellent delivery, pitches around the off stump and moves away from Mushfiqur who gets drawn on to the front foot and is beaten
full ball on off stump, Aftab tries to drive through extra cover but gets an inside edge through wide mid-on
full-length delivery on off and middle stump, driven on the front foot towards Malinga Bandara at mid-on
Fernando banged it in short, Aftab took his eyes off the ball and ducked, the ball hardly bounced and struck Aftab flush on the glove, luckily for him it didn't lob up
this time Aftab's ready for the short one and he pulls superbly to the long-leg fence
full-length delivery on off stump, driven off the front foot to mid-off
Fernando bowls another full ball outside the off stump, Aftab moves his front foot towards the ball and plays the drive firmly towards cover
good length delivery on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot
good length once again outside the off stump, Mushfiqur lunges forward and lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
pitches outside the off stump and angles away from Mushfiqur who lets it go
Maharoof persists with the line outside the off stump, Mushfiqur continues to leave it to Sangakkara
this one is straighter on middle stump, Mushfiqur waits on the back foot and plays it towards mid-on, Maharoof moves across and collects it
Maharoof finishes his spell with another one outside the off stump, 1 for 32 off ten overs on the trot, excellent effort
Fernando bowls a full toss on middle stump that Aftab plays towards mid-on for a quick single
short of a length outside the off stump, the bounce is too high for Mushfiqur to control and he gets an edge that runs through where gully would have been
Fernando strays on to Aftab's pads and he works it towards square leg for  a single
short of a length delivery angling towards middle stump, defended on the back foot towards point
Fernando bowls a fuller length on off and middle stump, Mushfiqur leans forward and pushes back to the bowler
sharp bouncer at 88mph to end the over, Mushfiqur hurriedly gets out of the way
slower delivery on middle stump, Aftab walks across his stumps and flicks to fine leg
strays on to leg stump this time, Mushfiqur leans across and flicks towards deep square leg
85 mph and wider outside the off stump this time, Aftab doesn't play a shot
slightly fuller but the line is still outside off stump, Aftab moves across and lets it go again
86mph, good length outside the off stump, Aftab opens the face and runs the ball down to third man
good length delivery on middle stump, Mushfiqur gets behind the line of the ball and defends
tossed up outside the off stump and the ball spins a long way away from Aftab who lets it go
flighted delivery on off stump, Aftab leans forward and drives to long-off
quicker and flatter delivery pitched on leg stump, Mushfiqur moves across and sweeps to long leg

Bandara gives it air outside the off stump, Aftab drives to cover and sets off for the single, Mushfiqur sends him back, the throw comes in and Sangakkara breaks the stumps, replays show that Aftab was safely back in his crease
defended on the front foot towards point
full delivery on middle stump, Aftab gets his front foot out of the way and lofts Bandara over mid-on, just out of the fielder's reach, for four
full and straight on middle and leg stump, Mushfiqur walks across and flicks down to fine leg for a single
good length delivery on off stump, Aftab walks forward and drives towards cover

87mph from Malinga, full and straight on off and middle stump, the ball swings back into Aftab who is caught on the crease as he tries to flick and gets hit on the pad plumb in front, Rudi Koertzen doesn't hesitate in sending Aftab on his way
good length delivery outside the off stump, Reza opens the face and plays it through gully for one
Malinga bowls on middle and leg stump, Mushfiqur walks towards the off side and flicks to square leg, if he gets hit on the pad he's a definite lbw candidate
Malinga tests Mushfiqur with another quick bouncer, the batsman ducks under it
Reza uses his feet to get to the pitch off the ball and lofts Bandara inside out over extra cover for six, lovely clean hit
Bandara bowls this one flatter on off stump and gets considerable turn away from the right-hander, left alone by Reza
defended on the front foot to silly point, who's just been brought in by Jayawardene
driven on the front foot to long-off
tossed up outside the off stump, Mushfiqur leans forward and defends to short third man
defended on the back foot to silly point
Malinga fires in the worker on middle stump, Reza manages to keep it out and gets a single to midwicket, the Sri Lankans think it hit the toe before the bat but it didn't
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
short of a length and wide outside the off stump, Mushfiqur runs the ball down to third man
the slower ball at 123 kmh outside the off stump, Reza was thoroughly beaten and played too early, had that been on target Malinga would have had another wicket
banged in short on the off stump, Reza leans out of the way
another slower ball outside off stump, Reza tried to loft it over the long-off fence but was beaten once again
Mushfiqur tries to sweep Bandara through midwicket but was no where close to making contact, that was a wild slog
common sense returns and Mushfiqur leans forward to defend
Mushfiqur tries to loft down the ground towards long-on, against the spin, but gets a leading edge that falls safely over extra cover
Reza goes on to the back foot and tries to cut but gets beaten
Reza lofts Bandara inside out over extra over again, it was in the air for quite some time but Jayasuriya didn't seem to pick it up, he fields it on the bounce
cut towards point on the back foot
Reza jams down at one that nearly finds the blockhole and squeezes it to third man
Malinga drifts on to leg stump, Mushfiqur moves across and flicks down to fine leg
Malinga gets a short ball to rise towards Reza's chest and has him in trouble, Reza fends it away awkwardly towards the off side
driven on the front foot towards cover
excellent bouncer at 85mph aimed at Reza's helmet, he gets under it in the nick of time
the bouncer is followed by the yorker, well dug out by Reza towards point
tossed up on leg stump, Mushfiqur leans forward and drives to long-on
Bandara flights it on middle and off stump, Reza drives hard at Dilshan at cover who fields the ball inspite of some very awkward bounce
driven to the man on the cover fence off the front foot
Mushfiqur strides forward and defends
Mushfiqur uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and lofts Bandara against the spin wide of long-on for four
swept to short fine leg
Reza gives him the charge straight away and lofts him down to long-on
Reza charges again and he strikes it cleanly over the long-off fence, superb hit with a lot of power
bowled quicker on off stump, Reza tried to come down again but had to re-adjust his stroke
Reza tries to come down again, but Jayasuriya spots him and drops it short
this time Reza stays back when Jayasuriya drops it short and pulls him handsomely over the midwicket boundary, Reza's making a fight of this
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Mushfiqur strides forward and drives to long-off for a single
this time Reza drives a full delivery to long-off
Mushfiqur waits for a wide delivery to reach him before cutting past point for two more
swept to deep backward square leg for another single
Reza leans forward and drives to long-off for a single
Mushfiqur jumps down the track and drives through covers for a single to finish the over
Mushfiqur plays it off his pads to short fine leg for a single
quicker delivery outside the off stump, Reza cuts to short third man
Reza uses his feet to step down the track and drive to cover
gone! Reza gets a bit too aggressive this time, attempting to go downtown again against Jayasuriya, but only manages to hole out to a diving Tharanga at long-on
tossed up on leg stump, Mortaza shuffles and turns it to short fine leg
tossed up fuller outside off stump and its steered to backward point
flighted up outside leg stump, easily worked into the vacant midwicket area for one
tossed up outside off stump, Rahim gets the front leg out and sweeps across the flight, picking it over midwicket for four
fuller on leg stump, flicked out to deep midwicket for one
good flight on that one, off stumpish, and its defended back
quicker outside off stump, he flashes the square-drive and very nearly inside-edges onto the stumps, the ball rolls fine for two
flighted up, steered to backward point
Mushfiqur plays the ball of his pads for a single in front of square leg
defended on the front foot to the off side
Jayasuriya angles the ball into Mortaza's middle stump, defended on the front foot
pushed toward covers on the front foot
Mortaza began to play the sweep but eventually nudged it towards third man
Mortaza tries to flick but misses, Jayasuriya appeals but the impact was outside the off stump
flatter delivery outside the off stump, Mushfiqur pushes it towards point and sets off for a single after a moment's hesitation
defended on the front foot to point

caught and bowled! Bandara bowls it flat on leg and middle stump, Mortaza leans forward and closes the face of the bat, trying to play it to midwicket against the spin, the leading edge lobs up towards silly mid-on and Bandara runs in front of the non-striker and takes an easy catch
full ball plays off the pads through midwicket, Razzak's off the mark
cut off the back foot to the fielder on the point fence
flighted delivery on middle stump, Mushfiqur uses his feet, comes down the track and drives back to Bandara
flat delivery on middle stump, Razzak defends to midwicket
pushed towards mid-off on the back foot
Razzak gets a leading edge but it doesn't carry to Jayasuriya
Razzak moves his front pad out of the way and lofts Jayasuriya over the long-on fence, powerful shot
defended on the front foot
flatter delivery on off and middle stump, Razzak leans forward and blocks
Mushfiqur gives Bandara the charge and ends up thrusting his pad to defend the ball
Mushfiqur  comes down the track again but plays the cut towards short third man
Mushfiqur uses his feet to the third ball in a row and drives to long off
massive hit, Razzak reaches out for one outside the off stump and slogs it over long-on for another six
flatter delivery on middle stump, played off the pads behind square
the ninth wicket falls, Bandara pitches it on leg stump inducing Mushfiqur to sweep against the turn, the ball hits the top edge and lobs up to Tharanga who takes a dolly at short fine leg
full ball on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
fuller delivery angling across Razzak who drives loosely at it and nearly gets the outside edge
pitches wide outside the off stump and moves further away from Razzak who lets the ball go
good length delivery pitches on off stump and squares Razzak up and beats the outside edge, that was extremely close to off stump too
Razzak tries to drive a full-length delivery outside off stump through covers but gets beaten
defended on the back foot towards cover, Fernando finishes a probing first over in his second spell
that was the wrong 'un on middle and off stump, Rasel defends on the back foot
driven on the front foot to long-off for  a single
Razzak clears his front foot out of the way and slog-sweeps Bandara into the gap at deep midwicket, four more
this is massive, Razzak slogs Bandara with the spin over wide long-on for six, that cleared the fence but a huge distance
played off the pads through midwicket for two more
pushed off the back foot towards fine leg
Fernando bowls one down leg side, easy decision for the umpire to make
Fernando angles the ball into Razzak from round the wicket, Razzak is cramped for room and defends on the back foot
defended on the back foot towards Fernando
bowled short of a length on off stump, the ball gets big on Razzak who moves back in his crease and takes one hand off the bat while defending
another one takes off from a good length and surprises Razzak who has to drop his wrists to avoid playing the ball
another short ball but wider outside the off stump this time
fuller delivery angling into Razzak's pads, he plays off the front foot towards mid-on
defended towards cover on the front foot
bowled flat on of stump, cut to point
Rasel leans forward and defends
played back to the bowler on the front foot
bowled slower through the air on off stump, Rasel defends towards the off side
blocked on the front foot
flat ball on leg and middle, defended on the front foot
flicked off the pads through midwicket

that's the end of the match, Rasel moves on to the back foot and nudges towards midwicket for a quick single, Dilshan charges in from midwicket, the pick up is spot on and he fires the throw into Sangakkara who whips off the bails in a flash with Razzak inches short of his crease
